tool_description: Generate random passwords that are hard to guess. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/passwordgenerator
name: Password Generator by API-Ninjas
title: Password Generator by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/passwordgenerator
api_list.description: API Ninjas Password Generator API endpoint. Returns a random password string adhering to the specified parameters.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_special_chars
optional_parameters.description: Whether to exclude special characters(**!@#$%^&*()**) from the password. Must be either **true** or **false**. If not set, a default value of **false** will be used.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_numbers
optional_parameters.description: Whether to exclude numbers from the password. Must be either **true** or **false**. If not set, a default value of **false** will be used.

optional_parameters.name: length
optional_parameters.description: length of password in characters. If not set, a default value of **16** is used.
